item.title: Comment on Getting to “Hello world” with d3 by Broto Bhattacharjee
item.dc:creator: Broto Bhattacharjee
item.description: @Anna it is probably not working because you have written src="../d3.v2.js" in the html file. However you might have downloaded a different version on d3. As in my case, I changed the line to src="../d3.js" and it worked thereafter.
item.content:encoded: @Anna it is probably not working because you have written src=”../d3.v2.js” in the html file. However you might have downloaded a different version on d3. As in my case, I changed the line to src=”../d3.js” and it worked thereafter.
